mapper.sql: Cost_Item_Id, Bill_Month, Cust_Id, Cust_Name, Region_Id, Region_Name, Busi_Mode, Pay_Type, Cont_Id, Used_Data, Exp_Data, Bill_Fee, Total_Fee, Off_Fee, Discount, Cost_Region, Cost_Center, Ext1, Ext2, Ext3
mapper.insert:
insert into tc_cost_bill_item (Cost_Item_Id, Bill_Month, Cust_Id, Cust_Name, Region_Id, Region_Name, Busi_Mode, Pay_Type, Cont_Id, Used_Data, Exp_Data, Bill_Fee, Total_Fee, Off_Fee, Income, Discount, Cost_Region, Cost_Center, Ext1, Ext2, Ext3) values
(#{item.costItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.billMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.busiMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{item.contId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usedData,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.expData,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.billFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.offFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.income,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.costRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.costCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
